text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0ce3733f7845013a66d90b193084a3664ad7ff99|patch 8.2.0022: click in popup window doesn't close it in the GUI>
patch 8.2.0022: click in popup window doesn't close it in the GUI

Problem:    Click in popup window doesn't close it in the GUI. (Sergey Vlasov)
Solution:   When processing the selection also send a button release event.
            (closes #5367)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0022: click in popup window doesn't close it in the GUI · vim/vim@0ce3733
attachments.text: Problem: Click in popup window doesn't close it in the GUI. (Sergey Vlasov) Solution: When processing the selection also send a button release event. (closes #5367)
